application.name: 签到
application.ability: 可用于签到、打卡、起床排名等活动中
application.description: 可自由设置签到时间、签到次数、奖励积分等
application.author: 艮随

manifest.install:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_signin_reply` ( `id` int(123) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(123) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则ID', `overtime` text NOT NULL COMMENT '超出时间段提示', `overnum` text NOT NULL COMMENT '超出次数提示', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=10 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_signin_record` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) NOT NULL, `from_user` text NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `time` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '签到时间', `rank` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '排名', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=58 ;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_signin_reply`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_signin_record`;
